comments:
Build 1.5RC2-20060515

Created an attachment (id=41774)
Fixes the resolution of the project for j2ee item providers
John -- can you review and release?
This is reviewed and released for the WTP 1.5 RC3 051806 driver.

This is part of a mass update to close out all stale WTP resolved bugs from the 1.0.x and 1.5.0 timeframe.  If you feel this bug was closed inappropriately, please reopen.

Thanks, John Lanuti
